name: Hell-school
description: "You, in the schoolyard, i'm ready to kill" -now i shoot you and you're dead. This is the best map i've ever made YET of all my times!! well that's a 1.9 MB wad. Well doomers, sorry there's not Tommygun, grenade launcher, pipebombs or anykind of new weapons. and there isn't a f-cking shitty pistol ANYMORE!! So yeah, it's based on my real hell school. yes HELL or FUCKING HELL. Are you tired from the teachers and the dickheads in your school?! Are you tired from school's work?! COME GET SOME MOMMA!! blow,burn,beat,stab,kill and DDIIIIEEE!!!!! You fully armed and protected!! and be GODLIKE!! it's better to type just "IDDQD" or type "god" in the console, don't ya think?!!! Assault everyone one by one in the schoolyard and the all god damn f-cking classes!! After all this you are the hero!! and everybody hopes that you killed everyone! Just remember: "NO SCHOOL", or even "NO RUSSIANS"(-nope i am not a goddamn hell COD fan..)
